bioghist.p: Margaret Prosser Allen is Associate Professor Emerita of Art at the University of Delaware. Ned Bliss Allen was a longtime Professor of English and department chair at the University of Delaware.

scopecontent.p: The Margaret and Ned Allen papers consist of material dating from 1938 to 1991. Included in the collection are research files, course notes, photographs, teaching notes, books, magazines, household notes, directories, yearbooks, newsletters, portfolios, course syllabi, correspondence, clippings, manuscripts, postcards, Christmas cards designed by Margaret Prosser Allen, and exhibit catalogs. Of particular interest are Margaret Allen's photographs, papers, and research files relating to her book, Ornament in Indian History (1991). The collection also includes a copy of Robert Hillyer's Poems for Music 1917-1948 (NY: Knopf, 1949), with laid in biographical notes related to Hillyer, clippings of Hillyer's poems, a letter from Hillyer to Allen with an attached manuscript regarding the 4th of July, pamphlets related to attractions in New York City, postcards, and photographs.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
